summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Nego's mobile responsiveness features. Admin pages (dashboard, verifications, payouts, analytics) are fully mobile responsive with hamburger menu and bottom navigation. Landing page talent carousel working with auto-scroll. One issue found: MobileBottomNav missing from /dashboard/browse and /dashboard/bookings pages.

ui_bugs.issue: MobileBottomNav component not included - mobile users cannot navigate from browse page
MobileBottomNav component not included - mobile users cannot navigate from bookings page

action_items: Add MobileBottomNav to /app/frontend/src/app/dashboard/browse/BrowseClient.tsx (import and render at bottom like MessagesClient.tsx)
Add MobileBottomNav to /app/frontend/src/app/dashboard/bookings/BookingsClient.tsx (import and render at bottom like MessagesClient.tsx)
critical_code_review_comments: AdminLayoutClient.tsx: Correctly implements mobile header with hamburger menu and AdminMobileNav bottom navigation
AdminMobileNav.tsx: Has data-testid attributes for all 4 nav items (dashboard, verify, payouts, analytics)
AnalyticsClient.tsx: New analytics page with stats (Total Users, Total Bookings, Revenue, Completion Rate) and charts (User Growth, Booking Trends, Revenue Over Time)
TalentSection.tsx: Horizontal carousel with auto-scroll, hover pause, navigation arrows, and 'See All' button linking to /dashboard/browse
NotificationBell.tsx: Uses fixed positioning on mobile (fixed right-2 left-2) to prevent cutoff
BrowseClient.tsx: MISSING MobileBottomNav import and render
BookingsClient.tsx: MISSING MobileBottomNav import and render
MessagesClient.tsx: Correctly includes MobileBottomNav at bottom
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin mobile responsiveness fully working. Landing page carousel working. Dashboard pages /dashboard/browse and /dashboard/bookings are missing MobileBottomNav component - needs to be added similar to MessagesClient.tsx pattern.

verified_working.admin_dashboard_mobile: ✓ Mobile header with hamburger menu, 2x2 stats grid, Quick Actions, AdminMobileNav with 4 items
verified_working.admin_hamburger_menu: ✓ Opens dropdown with Dashboard, Verifications, Payouts, Analytics, Sign Out
verified_working.admin_verifications_mobile: ✓ Filter buttons (All, Pending, Approved, Rejected), responsive card layout, AdminMobileNav
verified_working.admin_payouts_mobile: ✓ Stats cards, tabs (Withdrawal Requests, Talent Balances, History), AdminMobileNav
verified_working.admin_analytics_page: ✓ Stats (Total Users 44, Total Bookings 0, Revenue ₦0, Completion Rate 0%), User Growth chart, Booking Trends chart, Revenue Over Time chart, time range selector
verified_working.admin_desktop_sidebar: ✓ NEGO branding, nav items, user info, Sign Out button
verified_working.landing_page_carousel: ✓ Horizontal scroll, 16 talent cards (8 duplicated), navigation arrows, 'See All' button
verified_working.dashboard_messages_mobile: ✓ Has MobileBottomNav with 5 items (Home, Browse, Bookings, Messages, Profile)
verified_working.login_page_mobile: ✓ Responsive form, Google OAuth button visible

not_working.dashboard_browse_mobile: ✗ Missing MobileBottomNav - users cannot navigate away on mobile
not_working.dashboard_bookings_mobile: ✗ Missing MobileBottomNav - users cannot navigate away on mobile
